claim:
Thus, before completing the education program, participants had prior knowledge about opioids; preventing, detecting, and responding to an opioid overdose; and FDA-approved medications to treat opioid use disorder.Performance during the Opioid Education Program
As shown in Figure 1, accuracy on subtests increased only after participants completed the course relevant to each subtest.
title: Figure 1.
caption: The mean percent correct on content from Subtests 1, 2, and 3 across the four tests. The dashed lines show the administration of the relevant education course.

claim: Figure 2 provides a more detailed account of changes to individual participantsâ€™ accuracy on Subtests 1, 2, and 3 in the tests immediately before and after the relevant course.
title: Figure 2.
caption: The percent correct on content from Subtests 1, 2, and 3 in the test immediately before (unfilled dots) and after (filled dots) the administration of the relevant education course. Arrows and numerals show the direction and extent of changes in accuracy for individual participants.

claim: In most cases shown in Figure 2, participant accuracy increased after completion of the relevant course.
title: Figure 2.
caption: The percent correct on content from Subtests 1, 2, and 3 in the test immediately before (unfilled dots) and after (filled dots) the administration of the relevant education course. Arrows and numerals show the direction and extent of changes in accuracy for individual participants.

claim: The dashed lines show the administration of the relevant education course.Figure 2.
title: Figure 2.
caption: The percent correct on content from Subtests 1, 2, and 3 in the test immediately before (unfilled dots) and after (filled dots) the administration of the relevant education course. Arrows and numerals show the direction and extent of changes in accuracy for individual participants.

claim: These results are displayed graphically in Figure 3, which shows accuracy on each subtest across tests, organized by the analyzed covariates.
title: Figure 3.
caption: The mean percent correct on content from Subtests 1, 2, and 3 across the four tests, arranged by analyzed covariates. The dashed lines show the administration of the relevant computer-based education course.
